original_text: And his offering was one silver charger, the weight thereof was an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them were full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:
korean_text: 그의 헌물은 성소의 세겔로 백삼십 세겔 무게의 은반 하나와 칠십 세겔 무게의 은 바리 하나라 이 두 그릇에는 소제물로 기름 섞은 고운 가루를 채웠고

sentences.original_text: And his offering was one silver charger
the weight thereof was an hundred and thirty shekels
one silver bowl of seventy shekels
after the shekel of the sanctuary
both of them were full of fine flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘은 모두 고운 가루로 가득했으며

sentences.original_text: mingled with oil for a meat offering
